traits.name: Amphibious
entries: The sea serpent can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
entries: If the sea serpent fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Siege Monster
entries: The sea serpent deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The sea serpent makes one Bite attack and one Constrict or Tail attack.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +12 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 20 (2d12 + 7 damage) piercing damage plus 6 (1d12 damage) cold damage.

actions.name: Constrict
entries: Melee atk +12 to hit, reach 20 ft., one creature. 29 (4d10 + 7 damage) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 20). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the sea serpent can't constrict another target.

actions.name: Tail
entries: Melee atk +12 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 13 (1d12 + 7 damage) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 20 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 30 feet away from the sea serpent and knocked {@condition prone}.

actions.name: Rime Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The sea serpent exhales a 60-foot cone of cold. Each creature in that area must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw, taking 49 (9d10 damage) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Tail
entries: The sea serpent makes one Tail attack.

legendary.name: Bite (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The sea serpent makes one Bite attack
